fields.title: Playing with Gradients
fields.description:
Today I got some inspiration from a codepen email about a rotating gradient background. I implemented it with the colorscheme i have and think it looks pretty good. May play around with it some more as I develop the site, but think it could be cooler than just a plain background.

Next I am going to deploy the site to my S3 bucket, and continue planning / designing further progress.

fields.title: starting the site out
fields.description:
- I drew up some vague designs in my notebook of the plain splash page, that will redirect users to these notes. 
- Got the color scheme from [coolors](coolors.co) , I use it all the time. 
- Learned Sass variables better and got the palette all in variables.
- Hooked up the notes pages to this CMS

Now that I've got the basics up for show, I have to design the rest of the site, and figure out what content I want to include.

The goal of this is to be different from just an online portfolio or resume. I want this site to be a more interactive where I can display my past experience / interests / hobbies in a more fun way.

fields.title: Getting Started with Next.js
fields.description:
First day learning Next.js

nextjs.org docs learning SSR and doing sample tutorial to get started
- page based routing
- sass / css modules
- getStaticProps to pull in data from CMS

Page structure: Home page, which will temporarily hold the splash page that says it’s in development, but with a link to /blog that will render the daily development notes

On /blog there will be a list of blogPosts with links to /blog/:blogId

fields.aboutBody: Thomas is an MBA candidate at the University at Buffalo. He earned a Bachelor of Arts degree from the University at Buffalo Honors College in Economics, Sociology, and Urban Policy Studies. After graduating, he attended The Pennsylvania State University where he received a Master of Arts in Sociology and Demography. While working under Dr. John Iceland, he co-authored research and published an updated version of his master’s thesis [publication](https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/full/10.1177/1535684120981010).
fields.educationBody: Thomas currently works as a Revenue Management Analytics Intern at Life Storage.
fields.workBody: Thomas is currently pursuing opportunities in Real Estate and Private Equity. With his experience in finance, along with data analysis skills he is looking for a fast-paced, growth-oriented career.
fields.interestBody: Thomas is an avid reader of non-fiction, including biographies and socio-economic research. He enjoys going to theatrical productions and concerts. He resides in the Elmwood Village where many coffee shops are within walking distance.
